alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 3:58PM EDT until July 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near De Funiak Springs, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Fox Hill, Douglass Crossroad, Portland, Sand Hill, Alpine Heights, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Eucheeanna, Pleasant Hill, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge and New Home. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
